result.purpose: Responsible for managing push notifications in a wallet application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for managing components and services.

cmd/push_notification/config.go.purpose: Configuration struct for push notification service in a wallet application.

cmd/push_notification/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts a push notification application.

cmd/push_notification/routes.go.purpose: Defines routes and handlers for push notification services in an internal API.

cmd/push_notification/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the push notification application using Google Wire.

cmd/push_notification/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for push notification services using Wire.
